citation.description: reference to another creative work, such as a scholarly article

conformsto.description: reference to a standard to which the described resource conforms

fundedby.description: reference to an entity that provided funding for a resource

haspart.description: related resource that is physically/logically included in a resource

ispartof.description: related resource in which a resource is physically/logically included

issuetracker.description: location of an issue tracker for a resource

isversionof.description: related resource of which the a resource is a version, edition, or adaptation

location.description: location where a resource is available

modified.description: date on which the resource was changed

sameas.description: URL of a web page that unambiguously indicates a resource's identity

shortdescription.description: short description or summary or title of a resource

subject.description: topic of a resource, best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary

tag.description: tag or keyword (often multiple) for a resource

type.description: type or category of a resource (e.g. file, dataset)

unit.description: standardized quantity of a physical quality
